body: Hi Bugs and Bees Can any of you guide me to modify individual surface properties by selecting and applying different EP-materials on selected surfaces? In the example I only divide the surfaces into Roof/Wall/Floor-categories but these could very well be sub-catagorized into individual surfaces with unique EP-materials. Or can they? [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/U8LSueg-IYoU4wyhDStLdhi*EeBamw5MFQOh-gcgTCmXI1vIa1dKKPUAeGy1*61aQZv1ltPJMwegtWmtkYNIW1*elMfomb9l/How_to_modify_individual_EPmat.png) Mass2Zone requires Breps, so how do I supply this module with HB-surfaces if I can't perform Join (Brep) or Deconstruct (Brep) on HB-geometry without loosing the HB-sticky data? Best Regards Kristoffer
topic: How to modify individual EP materials and apply them correctly
